name: The Fire Burning
description:
Keep the fire alive and burning!

The night is cold and you need your fire to survive. However there seem to be some water sprites that wish to put out your fire... Stop them from extinguishing the flame and keep feeding fuel to the fire!

Controls

Use WASD to move around.
Space drops the current item you're holding at your feet.
If you're holding a log, use Left Mouse Button to throw the log into the fire or at water sprites!

Aim for the high score, or survive for as long as you can!

Made in 48 hours, this is my first game and first game jam! Don't mind the programmer art and sounds! It was a lot of fun and very satisfying to have finally made and released a game! Thank you for any and all feedback! I would love you see all of your high scores!
